column1: outside edge lobs in front of first slip. Possibly went off the thigh. Short of a length on middle stump, he defends inside the line on the back foot
full inswinger on leg stump, walks into it and flicks to deep square
bit of wobble at a middle stump line, on a good length. Watson gets forward to block
full inswinger onto the pads. Leans in and flicks handsomely to deep square's left
length on off stump, pushed across the batsman. Defended into the covers
short of a length outside off, jams it into the turf to point's left and calls early for the single
short of a length with late swing away outside off. Skids low too as he shapes to cut this. Beaten on the under-edge
short of a length outside off, chopped to third man
short and wide outside off. Withdraws his shot after setting up for the cut
length ball slanted in at the stumps, keeps very low as he gets behind the line. Forced to defend into the leg side
length on off stump, blocked into the off side
dropped short outside off, gets behind it and drags it wide of mid-on with a pull. That came on slowly off the pitch, but he got his timing just right
length and into the corridor. Leans in and flicks to midwicket on the up

taken in his follow through! Length ball pushed across him. Looks to hammer it on the rise into the off side. But it comes off slow again, and gets the bat's toe-end. Lobs back to Behrendorff who plucks it to his left
length outside off, through the drive too early. Gets an inside edge to short fine
full and wide outside off. Looks to drive through cover, gets it into the leg side off the toe
length on off stump, nudged to extra cover on the rise
length outside off, walks into the off side and clips to deep square
shot! Elite timing from Ferguson. Short of a length and just outside off and he opens the face and chops this just right to get it to blaze away to point's right
slower ball at a length on leg stump, stabbed through the square leg region off the front foot
short of a length on his hips. Hangs on top of it and nudges this wide of short fine leg with the angle
length outside off, gets forward to punch and nutmeg the bowler. Mid-on cleans up
length on off stump, gets across to flick to deep midwicket
length ball outside off, looks to push through cover. Gets it to mid-on off the inside half
length on off stump, looks to poke through cover and gets it to mid-on again. Off the inside half
full outside off, stays slightly leg side of it and opens the face as he drives to get this between mid-off and extra cover
full on off stump, shuffles across and flicks to deep square
scoops him over fine leg! Length ball pushed across off stump. Quickly falls into the off side, dips his shoulder and watches it closely as he lifts it fine
slower ball floated up at off stump. Drilled straight back at the bowler
length outside off, tapped on the rise to extra cover's right
length at leg stump, walks at it and looks to flick. Cops it on the thigh
length on leg stump, clipped on the up to deep square
waits on the slower ball as it floats away from him and then meets it on the half-volley outside off. Jabs at it and gets it between cover and extra
length on middle stump, flicked to deep square
superb. Ferguson has gauged the pace of this pitch so well. Slower, short of a length just outside off. Waits on it and gets a cut to backward point's left this time. Beats third man too
slower ball, length outside off. Gets behind it to flick in front of short fine
length outside off, blocked into the off side
full on leg stump, driven to long-on
length outside off, reverse-sweep finds short third
length outside off, punched to sweeper on the rise
short and just outside off, cut to sweeper's left
length outside off, tapped into the covers off the toe-end
length on leg stump, flicked to short fine's left
slower ball at a length on leg stump, trickles down leg side as he looks to flick it
short of good length outside off, punched to cover
short of good length outside off, swivel-pulled to deep square leg
short, strangles him for room, tries to hook and the ball goes over the bat
this time he gets a lot more width outside and swings hard at a pull but this time he's beaten by pace
shortish, angled in, arches back and runs it down to third man
slider on leg stump, keeps low as he whips it away to square leg
short of length, spinning away, cut to deep cover
flashes away from the body and gets an inside edge towards short fine leg
swipes hard across the line and doesn't quite middle it as it rolls away between deep midwicket and long-on
backs away and forces a cut to deep point
short of a length outside off, looks to swat into the leg side and ends up slicing it over the bowler
short and down leg side. Shapes to ramp this but it jumps too wide
slower ball, dropped short and sitting up at leg stump. Waits on it and swipes through to find the long leg boundary
slower ball at a length on leg stump. Gets down to ramp and adjusts to paddle it to fine leg
short and just outside off. Backs away and looks to cut, but is beaten
full at middle stump, steps across and flicks to deep square leg
short at off stump. Under-edge on the pull to fine leg
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square's left
length outside off, check-drive to extra cover's right
full slower ball on leg stump, flicked through midwicket
full and skidding through quickly outside off. Slashes at it and is beaten
slower ball at a length wide outside off. Steps out and check-punches this to Agar's left at mid-off...and his dive is half-baked and this slips through
short of a length and rising above middle stump. Backs away and slashes at it to be beaten
length ball down leg side, can't get bat on the flick
slower ball full at middle stump, driven down to long-on
short ball outside off, gets a nice big swing at this pull, but he finds midwicket on the bounce
slower ball, full at leg stump. Clipped to deep square
short ball just outside off, rolls his wrists and gets this pull to deep square's right
full and in at leg stump. Flicks between fine leg and deep square
short ball outside off, looks to pull and gets a top edge into the midwicket area
full at leg stump, steps out and yorks himself. Off the inside edge to deep square as he looks to drive
length at middle stump, steps out and drives to long-on off the toe-end
full and in at leg stump. Dragged to deep midwicket off the inside half
clears deep midwicket! Sweet connection from Ferguson. Length ball outside off, gets down for the sweep and swings hard to nail this slog sweep and get it over the boundary, flat
middle stump is out. That stays shin height from a short length. Ferguson backs away to try and punch through cover and there's no way he can stop this from hitting the stumps. Kept too low
length ball skidding low at off stump. Gets deep in the crease and stabs into the off side
slower ball, full outside off. Jammed into the covers
slower ball at a length outside off. Looks to stab it through cover. Rolls back past the bowler off the inside half
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Under-edge through to the keeper as he looks to cut
past off stump before rolling through to the keeper. Slower ball at a length, just outside off. Swings across the line and is beaten as this goes shin height
slower ball at a length outside off, driven to sweeper's right
short ball at middle stump. Loses his balance as he looks to pull, but gets this down to fine leg
class! Superb feet from Root. Length outside off, he steps out to meet it at the pitch and uses the turn to launch this over extra cover
rolls onto the stumps off his pad. Another one keeps low. Length ball, headed down leg side. Looks to sweep and this deflects off the front pad and rolls on from under him
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length on leg stump, poked through midwicket off the back foot
length ball skidding low at leg stump. Hurriedly pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
short and outside off. Backs away to cut to sweeper cover
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
slower short ball outside off, pulled to deep square off the inside half
slower ball at a length outside off, looks to stab through cover. Gets it to long-on

taken at long-off! Agar leaps to his left and holds on. This was a slower ball, dropped short outside off. He lined up and summoned all his core strength to slap this, but couldn't get it over Agar. Big wicket for Scorchers
dropped short outside off, pulled straight to deep midwicket
short ball at off stump. Gets under it and looks to hook, beaten
slower ball, short of a length and in at leg stump. Looks to pull and cops this on the thigh
reverse swat for the fifty! Slower ball in the corridor again. Arches back a tough and swats to try and go over short third man. Ends up slicing it much finer, but that's the result he wanted
bouncer at off stump, late on the hook. Lobbed into the square leg region
length on leg stump, tapped through mid-on off the inside half
length and in at middle stump. Backs into the off side and ramps it fine. Fine leg gets across to his right and keeps this in
length outside off, punched to long-off's left on the up

hit wicket! That full slower ball is so slow, Buttler's swing on the reverse-sweep has come extremely early. It's longer as a result, because he still has eyes on the ball. Makes connection with it too, off the inside edge. It rolls through to the keeper but he hits the stumps with that same edge
bouncer in the corridor, backs away to try and ramp it. Beaten
full and in at leg stump. Backs away to try and drive through the leg side. Inside edge onto pad, trickles pitch side into the leg side

hits the helmet. Bouncer gets big on him as he steps out premeditatedly. He's on the front foot as he looks to hit this and takes his eyes off it. Hits him on the side of the head. He's on his feet though.
short ball up at the chest. Caught on the front foot and hooking from under it again. Top edge to fine leg's right
dropped short outside off, gets a nice swing into this pull and gets it to the vacant midwicket boundary
full and wide outside off, slashes at it and is beaten
length ball in at leg stump. Squats and swipes from under, ends up slicing it straight to deep square
yorker at leg stump, following him down leg side. He jabs it to long-on off the toe-end
slower ball at a length down leg side. Looks to shovel this into the leg side, gets it on the thigh
short and just outside off. Backs away to cut and gets an inside edge into the pitch
length ball at off stump, backs away and absolutely pummels this on the up, straight past the bowler. Mid-off is in and long-on has no chance
slower ball at a length, wide outside off. Long-off completely misses this! A swat from Sandhu that is lobbed up at NCN at long-off. He runs in and...lets it go. It was to his left and he didn't know
length on middle stump, slogs off the toe-end to long-on's left
slower ball, full outside off. Sets up for and there's plenty of room for him to swing through the line. Gets it right off the middle and well wide of mid-off
yorker at off stump, drills it back at the bowler who fumbles in his follow through and allows a single on the leg side
slower ball, short and climbing across the corridor. Backs away for the pull but misses
full at middle stump, looks to slog this and gets it off the toe-end. It drops to deep midwicket's right and they come back for the second
full, slanted across off, pushed into the covers
back of a length, pitching outside leg, tucked fine
full, swinging away outside off, runs it away to third man with an open face
good length outside off, drops in front of mid-off for a quick one
full outside off, driven to extra cover
nips away outside off, rolls off the outside edge down to third man
slanted across quick, beats the flashing bat
good length, slanted across off, defended
fuller, flicks this from middle stump back to Cook who slightly fumbles after getting down to his left
full, sliding into middle, driven to long-on
floated up outside off, whipped back to the bowler
on a length and spinning in, nudged behind square off the pad
full outside off, reaches out and pushes to cover
short, slanted across on off, turns around and pulls behind square leg
short, pitching outside leg and going sharply over him
short of good length on off, punched to point
full, angling into the pads, clipped to square leg
back of a length, pushed across, punched behind point
drives a fuller one to mid-off
clips a fuller one off the toes to deep square leg
sliding into middle and leg, tries to launch it over but with the kind of pace on offer, all he can do is launch it into the hands of long-on running to his right
looped up on leg stump, clipped to square leg
flicks a fuller one off the pads to deep midwicket
length on leg stump, looks to play the flick. Pings into the leg side off the pad
length on leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket where Watson misfields
length on middle stump, tapped to mid-on with soft hands
slower ball at a length on leg stump, defended into the leg side
length on middle stump, tapped to deep square's left
slower ball at a length outside off. Looks to chip into the leg side and gets a leading edge to third man
length on leg stump, clipped to deep square off the back foot
full at off stump, jammed out to mid-off
length on leg stump, pushes at it as it slides on. Inside edge to short fine
length outside off, uppish punch past the bowler
length at off stump, gets the front leg across and pushes down the pitch
length and skidding down leg side. Can't get bat on that and the keeper can't hold on. Single at short fine
googly, dropped short and turning down leg
googly at a length outside off, gets on the front foot and pushes into the off side
length outside off, steps out and drives to sweeper cover
length on off stump, gets on the back foot and flicks to deep square's left
short at leg stump, gets deep in the crease and drags to deep square's left
low full toss on leg stump, flicked to deep square's left
googly, short of a length on leg stump. Gets deep in the crease and punches to long-on
length and pushed through fast at leg stump. Flicked to deep midwicket
length outside off, toe-ends a lofted drive to long-off
length ball pushed across off stump. Steps out and pushes down the pitch
short of a length on off stump, tapped back to the bowler
clears long-on! Great connection from Bancroft. Full on middle stump, plonks the front leg down and uses the pace of Green to gets this off the higher part of the middle
length on leg stump, tapped through square leg off the back foot
full on leg stump, driven to long-on off the front foot
googly, sliding in and low outside off from a short length. Beaten on the cut
length on leg stump, clipped hurriedly to deep midwicket
length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
that looks plumb! Klinger rooted to the crease as this googly rips back in. Looks to play across the line, trying to flick through midwicket. Trapped right in front of middle stump
length ball, skidding low outside off. Chopped into the covers
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
short of a length, low and in at leg stump. Tapped to midwicket off the back foot
length outside off, gets forward and stabs at it. Inside edge onto front foot

was that outside off? No, thinks the umpire. Length ball skidding through low and in at off stump. Bancroft shuffles across to flick and might be caught just inside the line. There was no forward stride there, so no doubt about height
length ball outside off, skids past the inside edge as he hangs his bat away from the body. Massive gap between bat and pad
length outside off, driven uppishly to long-off
tossed up at middle stump, pushed to midwicket off the inside half
length on leg stump, poked down to long-on

taken one-handed at slip! Watson sticks his left hand out and grabs onto this outside edge. Length ball pushed through flat outside off. Agar steps out and looks to go leg side, but he isn't to the pitch and this spins just enough. Superb reflexes from Watson, that bat speed was high on that. Ball was really flying away
length at leg stump, looks to push to long-on, gets an inside edge onto pad
length at leg stump, defended to midwicket off the inside edge
length just outside off, hurriedly poked to extra cover's left and they make the run despite a mix-up
direct hit! From deep point! Length ball outside off, poked off the front foot to sweeper's left. He rockets a throw at the base of off stump as Cartwright comes back for the second. Stunning.
full on middle stump, gets down to paddle this to short fine
length on middle stump, keeps low as he makes room and taps to extra cover
length at leg stump, punched to long-on
length at leg stump, flicked to deep square's right
short of a length and keeping low outside off. Tapped to midwicket's left off the toe-end
length ball skidding in at middle stump. Gets very low and uses the angle to paddle this past short fine

length ball down leg side this time and a powerful sweep from Bosisto. Deep square covers a lot of ground to his right and puts in a dive to get his hands on this, but it trickles into the boundary behind him as he slides to the right
length outside off, dropped pitch side on the off side off the front foot
full on middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket's left
googly outside off, keeps low as he gets down to sweep and is beaten
length on middle stump, swept to short fine's left

run-out chance missed. Length ball pushed flat at middle stump. Gets forward to defend and gets an inside edge into the leg side. Turner takes off for the run without calling. Bowler can't hit direct as he's sent back
length on leg stump, nudged through square leg off the inside half
length outside off, flicked to long-on's right
length and skidding low at leg stump. Tapped to long-on
length on off stump, looks to close the face on this, gets a leading edge back to the bowler
length outside off, gets across into the leg side, pushes through midwicket
length outside off, poked through cover off the front foot

short of a length in at off stump. Tapped to extra cover's right. A direct hit from Watson there, running in and flicking at the stumps with an underarm. But he was in. And they take the second as the ball deflects into the leg side
short and wide outside off, throws his hands at this and gets a thick outside edge that flies to short third man's left
length and in at leg stump. Cops it on the pad as he looks to flick
past off stump. Rolls the fingers on this and gets it to straighten after angling in at off stump on a good length. Turner heaves at it and is beaten
short and in at leg stump. Flicked to fine leg's left
slower ball at a length on middle stump. Thick outside edge into the off side as he looks to close the face on this
short of a length at off stump, flicked to deep square's right
short ball rising up at middle stump. Looks to pull and gets an inside edge onto body that deflects to short third man

over fine leg and into the boundary, one bounce. Misjudged by the fielder down there. Bouncer and he swipes under it. Top edge sails over the fielder, who is already a couple of yards in on the long boundary before he takes forward strides
slower short ball at the waist, pulled to fine leg's left
slower ball at a length on off stump, tapped to extra cover's right off the front foot
slower ball wide outside off. Shapes to drive and is forced to check his shot. Pushes it back down the pitch
low full toss outside off, driven to long-off's left
slower short ball outside off, pulled firmly between deep midwicket and long-on
slower ball at a length outside off, dragged to deep midwicket with a slog
slower ball, wide outside off at a good length. Swept to deep square
low full toss wide outside off, tapped to sweeper's right
length ball just outside leg stump. Runs down at it and has a slog, cops it on the pad
yorker length at leg stump. Looks to flick and cops it on the toe
short of a length at leg stump, steps out and cops it on the thigh as he looks to flick. Buttler swoops down on it, swivels and puts in a throw that misses at the other end. Would have been out
full and wide and slow outside off. Batsman's moved a long way down leg side and toe-ends this to long-off
low full toss on off stump, backs away, makes room, and hammers this back past the non-striker

pumps it long over long-on! Green slows it down and beats him in flight outside off. He runs down at it and clubs it anyway. Superb connection despite having to reach out a long way. A great over has turned in the last two balls
slower short ball outside off. Pulled past the non-striker and to long-on's left
slower ball, short and wide outside off. Gets low and chops it to sweeper's left
full and wide outside off, inside edge onto the pitch and into the body as he backs away and looks to carve this
looks for the reverse ramp but can't get bat on it. Slower ball, short of a length in the corridor. Clips his back thigh and rolls through to Buttler
slower ball, at a length and wide outside off. Swipes at it and is beaten. Buttler can't collect cleanly as this dies on him
short ball in at the hips. Walks at it and pulls to deep square's right
slower ball, yorker length outside off. Tough to hit that. Meets it on the full and jams it out to long-o
bisects deep midwicket and long-on! And that's fifty for Turner. Slower ball at a length, skidding in at middle stump and he gets behind the line to punch this firmly. Strong arms
slower ball, cutting away from the wide marker. But Turner swipes at it and gets it to long-off off the toe-end. Sandhu is slow there and they pick up the second

beats deep square leg! Sams with a thigh-high full toss at off stump. Turner walks into the off side and shovels it behind square on the leg side. Fielder sprints and lunges at this but can't get his fingers on it
wide! The home crowd cannot believe this. Are those boos for the umpire? He isn't wrong here at all. Short of a length, turning a long way away outside off
full and wide outside off, very very wide outside off. Left alone. Turner's shuffles into the off side is forcing him to push it wide
just clears extra cover. Good slower ball, full outside off. Doesn't get to the pitch as he looks to drill this straight. Thick outside edge is over Watson

he's done it! Sams has just about held on. Slower ball, short of a length outside off. Turns away from him as he goes angled-bat on this and across the line. Can only get it along the floor to long-on's left
